short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The plugin for real-time alert on the browser page during web development.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You send text data to the plugin, the plugin displays it in the browser page.
This plugin is useful when developing programs using Gulp, Webpack, Grunt, etc.

► Pros
• Sound and visual notification.
• Automatically connects after the browser page reloads.
• Supports remote server connection.

► Official website «Live Alert Browser Page»
https://live-alert-browser-page.com

► Packages and documentation
https://github.com/Yuriy-Svetlov/live-alert-bp
